      • hasBeenHereBefore

        public boolean hasBeenHereBefore(java.lang.Integer messageID)
        Method which checks if the message has been here before to eliminate the possibility of Loops
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if the message has been here before

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(java.lang.Integer value)
        This method adds the ID of a Message to the array of the Messages that got through this MessageCenter
        Parameters:
        value - The ID of the Message that needs to go through this MessageCenter

      • isFitForMe

        public boolean isFitForMe(Message message)
        Method to see if a Message can be processed by this MessageCenter
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be checked
        Returns:
        Returns true if this MessageCenter can handle the message meaning if any component contained int this class can handle the message

      • getTheComponentFitForTheMessage

        public Component getTheComponentFitForTheMessage(Message message)
        Method which finds the right Component to handle the Message
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be processed
        Returns:
        Returns the component that can handle the Message received as parameter

      • processMessage

        public Message processMessage(Message message)
        Method which processes the message received and returning the message processed by the right Component
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be processed
        Returns:
        Returns the message that has been processed or null if there was no component that could have processed the message received as argument
